title: Electronic Notebook: Free-Energy Decomposition of Salt Effects on the Solubilities of Small Molecules and the Role of Excluded-Volume Effects (GAFF/SPCE/Heyda et al)
description: This repository contains electronic notebooks (Jupyter) for reproducing the simulation results in the work titled above
